text: Atu keenik (Aadam xaylo kinnuk) duddu hayte mara isi xongoloy umaaneh ken edde sectat ken esgeyyiyaay haliffi ken hayis, ku qandek faarislee kee ibaybah tanim keenil seecaay kobxis, maaluu kee xaylot keenî luk engelaay ganô xaganah ken xagnis, Sheytan ken kah xagnisam mali duquurusiyyaa kee deedal akke waytek kaak iyye Yalli
